Title: Linear Programming
Body: Date: Wed, 20 Nov 1996 22:14:58 GMT Server: NCSA/1.4.2 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Tue, 03 Sep 1996 13:08:56 GMT Content-length: 1503 Linear Programming Linear Programming (Computer Science 16) Identical to Mathematics 16 Times: 97S: 12  98S: Arrange Instructors: Bogart Prerequisite: Mathematics 6 or 8 or equivalent knowledge of matrix algebra and permission of the instructor Dist: TAS This course introduces one of the fundamental tools of modern business planning and an exciting area of current mathematical and computer science research.
